dataset_id: SnowEx20 Senator Beck Basin Transect Ground Surface Temperature V001
title: SnowEx20 Senator Beck Basin Transect Ground Surface Temperature V001
summary: This data set contains hourly ground surface temperature measurements collected between 20 October 2019 and 18 July 2020. Data were collected at 7 points along two plant monitoring transects in the Upper Basin of the Senator Beck Study Basin. Temperatures were measured using iButton temperature sensors.
